##
<div style="text-align:center">
## Natalie Bianca Alexander
</div>
Welcome to my website, where I proudly present my Data Science for Industry course (STA5073Z) project 2023. The primary goal for this project was to construct classification models that can take a sentence of text as input and return a prediction of which South African president was the source of that sentence. 
<br>
[Click here to re-direct to the GitHub repository](https://github.com/NatalieAlexander/STA5073Z_Assignment1)

[Click here to re-direct to the website](https://nataliealexander.github.io/STA5073Z_Assignment1/)

##

<div style="text-align:center">
## Data
The dataset includes a corpus of text documents containing the State of the Nation Address (SONA) speeches delivered by the President of South Africa between the years 1994 to 2023.
